t: Amazon Compact by Design | SCS Global Services
s: With the removal of excess air and water, products certified Compact by Design require less packaging which makes them more efficient to ship and leads to carbon emission reductions. Work with SCS Global Services to meet the requirements for Compact by Design and get badged on Amazon.

t: Amazon launches "Climate Pledge Friendly" program
s: Mrs. Meyer's multi-surface concentrate is another Climate Pledge Friendly product that has earned the Compact by Design certification. It is a concentrated formula designed to eliminate excess water, with one 32-ounce bottle able to make more than 16 gallons of cleaning solution.
